Welcome to our new Joiners

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1372&user=10620> 	

Drazen Bilafer joins the Group as Senior Project Manager, reporting directly to Gilbert Boustany.

He brings 14 years of experience in construction across procurement, operations, and execution, with a strong foundation in architecture.

Drazen will drive the successful execution of key projectsâ€”ensuring alignment with client objectives, elevating team performance, and delivering high-quality results on time and within budget. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1372&user=10620> 

Danielle Dawson joins the Group as Director â€“ Programme & Project Management, reporting to Alejandro Ramos.

She brings 14 years of global retail transformation experience, specialising in omnichannel, customer experience, and enterprise tech delivery.

Danielle will lead the execution of our omnichannel programmes across e-commerce, retail operations, supply chain, and customer experience.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1373&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1373&user=10620>
